GClasses::GIncrementalLearner

GClasses::GIncrementalLearner Class Reference

This is the base class of supervised learning algorithms that can learn one row at a time. More...

#include <GLearner.h>

Inheritance diagram for GClasses::GIncrementalLearner:

List of all members.

 GIncrementalLearner ()
 GIncrementalLearner (GTwtNode *pLearner)
virtual ~GIncrementalLearner ()
virtual bool isFilter ()
 Only the GFilter class should return true to this method.
virtual bool canTrainIncrementally ()
 Returns true.
virtual void enableIncrementalLearning (sp_relation &pRelation, int labelDims, double *pMins, double *pRanges)=0
 You must call this method before you call trainIncremental pMins specifies the minimum values. pRanges specifies (max - min) values. (Only the min and range values for continuous attributes will actually be used, so it is safe to pass in NULL for both arrays if all attributes are nominal.).
virtual void trainIncremental (const double *pIn, const double *pOut)=0
 Pass a single input row and the corresponding label to incrementally train this model.
virtual void trainSparse (GSparseMatrix *pData, int labelDims)=0
 Train using a sparse matrix. (Typically, implementations of this method will iterate over the rows in pData, and for each row it will convert the sparse row to a full row, call trainIncremental, and then discard the full row.).

Detailed Description

This is the base class of supervised learning algorithms that can learn one row at a time.

virtual bool GClasses::GIncrementalLearner::canTrainIncrementally (  )  [inline, virtual]

Returns true.

Reimplemented from GClasses::GTransducer.

virtual void GClasses::GIncrementalLearner::enableIncrementalLearning ( sp_relation &  pRelation,
int  labelDims,
double *  pMins,
double *  pRanges 
) [pure virtual]

You must call this method before you call trainIncremental pMins specifies the minimum values. pRanges specifies (max - min) values. (Only the min and range values for continuous attributes will actually be used, so it is safe to pass in NULL for both arrays if all attributes are nominal.).

Implemented in GClasses::GKNN, GClasses::GInstanceTable, GClasses::GNaiveBayes, GClasses::GNaiveInstance, GClasses::GNeuralNet, and GClasses::GFilter.

virtual bool GClasses::GIncrementalLearner::isFilter (  )  [inline, virtual]

Only the GFilter class should return true to this method.

Reimplemented in GClasses::GFilter.

virtual void GClasses::GIncrementalLearner::trainIncremental ( const double *  pIn,
const double *  pOut 
) [pure virtual]

Pass a single input row and the corresponding label to incrementally train this model.

Implemented in GClasses::GKNN, GClasses::GInstanceTable, GClasses::GNaiveBayes, GClasses::GNaiveInstance, GClasses::GNeuralNet, and GClasses::GFilter.

virtual void GClasses::GIncrementalLearner::trainSparse ( GSparseMatrix *  pData,
int  labelDims 
) [pure virtual]

Train using a sparse matrix. (Typically, implementations of this method will iterate over the rows in pData, and for each row it will convert the sparse row to a full row, call trainIncremental, and then discard the full row.).

Implemented in GClasses::GKNN, GClasses::GInstanceTable, GClasses::GNaiveBayes, GClasses::GNaiveInstance, GClasses::GNeuralNet, and GClasses::GFilter.
